data.eml:eml: New record and redescription of Calanopiathompsoni A. Scott, 1909 (Copepoda, Calanoida, Pontellidae) from the Red Sea, with notes on the taxonomic status of C. parathompsoni Gaudy, 1969 and a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Al-Aidaroos, Ali M., Salama, Adnan J., El-Sherbiny, Mohsen M. (2016): New record and redescription of Calanopiathompsoni A. Scott, 1909 (Copepoda, Calanoida, Pontellidae) from the Red Sea, with notes on the taxonomic status of C. parathompsoni Gaudy, 1969 and a key to species. ZooKeys 552: 17-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.552.6180, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.552.6180
